TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContactManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class ContactManager Implements IDisposable
public ref class ContactManager sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示持久保存在 Windows 通讯簿中的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类具有没有公共构造函数，因为对它的引用返回的类。This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the class. 解决与关联的丛书管理包括与对等主机和远程对等方关联的那些。Address books that are associated with management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer. 任何一台计算机可能与其他对等节点; 协作到远程对等方，但不是主机对等本地对等方时，它可以添加到主机对等方。Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the of the host peer. 某些操作类，如和、 关联到关联的远程对等方的 Windows 通讯簿正在执行的操作。Certain operations on the class, such as and , correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer. 主机的对等方有权访问为此持久性存储区可以与方用要参与对等方的应用程序相关联的信息。The host peer has access to this persistent storage for information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate. A可以将自己标识为的用户的计算机上的持久存储区。A can identify itself as a user of a persistent store on a computer. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何枚举和将其添加为到本地:The following example code illustrates how to enumerate a and add it as a to the local : [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于订阅是每个用户并不是每个进程或每个应用程序域，主机上运行的另一个应用程序可能也会导致引发此事件。Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised. 此事件需要的。This event requires a of .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ SynchronizingObject { System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::ISynchronizeInvoke ^ value); };

summary.span: 设置此属性值后，将在创建特定 的线程上为因异步操作而未激发的所有事件回调关联的事件处理程序。

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 实现 接口的对象，此对象在创建它的线程上供该事件处理程序同步类型的实例使用。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是`null`，它指示系统线程池线程上调用所有事件处理程序。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此属性通常设置为 UI 元素如实例。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.
